scripts.compress: terser assets/js/document-store.js -o assets/js/document-store.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/search-index.js -o assets/js/search-index.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: node build-index.js && terser assets/js/document-store.js -o assets/js/document-store.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/search-index.js -o assets/js/search-index.min.js -c -m
